Class Author

java.lang.Object
Author
public class Author extends Object
Represents an author of a library resource. Includes the author's first name, surname, and address. Provides methods to access and update the author's details. This class is used in conjunction with LibraryResource to provide additional metadata about resources. Example usage: 
 Author author = new Author("Jane", "Doe", "123 Main St, Fiction Town");
 System.out.println(author.getFirstName()); // Outputs: Jane
 author.printDetails();
Version:
(6 December 2024)
Author:
(Neil Hutton)
